Text:
Well, you're welcome!! 

Are you all prepared for the last episode coming up tomorrow?

Claudia

Hi, Claudia! On the one hand, I wanna see the last episode(s) but on the other hand, I just can't stand the idea of them being the very last ones..... :(  I shall miss it but have decided to try and get into a new one if only because I want and appreciate your uploads so much ! It's been a great ride and you have done such a wonderful 'job' so I'll certainly stay in touch every once in a while :) THANK YOU, THANK YOU & THANK YOU !!!

hello claudia, as I' m waiting for your last atwt upload, it surprises me the sun got up today... I watched it already a little on the cbs site but I was to drunk to actually watch the end. I prefer to watch the claudiaz version...
